name: #Alive
description:
Waking up in a strange room is not a pleasant experience, especially when you remember you have been snatched up by an alien light in the middle of a busy street in broad daylight. 

Help Seven explore and investigate her surroundings to find out why she has been kidnapped and how she can get back home.

How to play?

Movement - WASD

Action - E

Inventory - I

Pause - P

Credits:

Thank you to GameDevHQ , all my 3D and most of my 2D assets are from their File base.

Thank you to the artists from "The Ultimate Game Music Collection" for their wonderful music.

To the player...

Thank you for playing my game, hope you enjoy it!

Created for the Weekly Game Jam #168. Theme - 'Pass the Torch'
